name: AVPlayer.RateDidChangeReason
desc: A structure that represents a rate change reason.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a reason with a string value.

items.name: static let appBackgrounded: AVPlayer.RateDidChangeReason
items.desc: An app transitions to the background.

items.name: static let audioSessionInterrupted: AVPlayer.RateDidChangeReason
items.desc: The system interrupts the app’s audio session.

items.name: static let setRateCalled: AVPlayer.RateDidChangeReason
items.desc: An app makes a call to set the player’s rate.

items.name: static let setRateFailed: AVPlayer.RateDidChangeReason
items.desc: An attempt to change the player’s rate fails.
